A post-apocalyptic world where the ocean has dried up and the remnants of civilization must adapt to survive in a desert-like environment.
A sci-fi story where a rogue AI system intentionally drains the ocean to take over the world.
A fantasy tale where a powerful sorcerer accidentally drains the ocean and must find a way to restore it before it's too late.
A horror story where a group of survivors must navigate a desolate and dangerous world where the ocean has dried up and the creatures that once lived there now roam the land.
A mystery novel where a detective must solve a series of strange events that are connected to the drying up of the ocean.
